data.text:
July 2022

Our stay at Liberty Hill Inn exceeded our high expectations. John called us to say the room was ready if we wanted to check in before the published time. We had other plans, but that was the first of many nice gestures. He also made suggestions of several restaurants for our first nights dinner. When I told him where we had already planned to go, he suggested reservations, which proved quite a wise choice even though it was the off season. John called and made those for us, again a nice gesture. The afternoon cookies and the wide assortment of complimentary beverages was much appreciated. The breakfast each morning was phenomenal! We really enjoyed visiting with John and Kris and them sharing their varied life experiences. It certainly felt like family when we left. We will definitely stay again if visiting Cape Cod and encourage others to avail themselves to this fantastic B&B.

– Craig T Stockton Iowa

Welcome to the Liberty Hill Inn Cape Cod, a TripAdvisor.com Travelers Choice, award-winning bed and breakfast located in Yarmouth Port.

The Liberty Hill Inn’s main house accommodates five spacious rooms, from the ground floor to the third floor. All rooms have private baths, new quiet air-conditioning units, and TVs. Wi-Fi is accessible on the entire property, and free on-site parking is included with your stay.

The original architectural details of the Main House have been preserved. The decor, while paying deference to the age of the house, is warm and inviting. Modern conveniences – like wall unit air conditioning in the rooms and central air conditioning in the Inn – keep the entire Inn comfortable at all times.

The Inn features a wraparound porch from where guests can a view and enjoy the private side-yard garden. Behind the Main House is a lovely brick patio, also in the garden area. The Main House and the Carriage House are only forty feet apart so there is easy access for guests.

The Carriage House is handicap accessible, and the Main House may also be accessed via a ramp to the wraparound porch.
